Exaggerate: The claim that the Islamic State attempted to attack Fort Knox is exaggerated, as there is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence, as there is no documented instance of the Islamic State attempting to attack Fort Knox.
Problematic assumption: The claim is based on a problematic assumption that the arrest of two Iraqi nationals in Kentucky on federal terrorism charges in 2011 was related to an attempted attack on Fort Knox.
Exist alternative explanation: There are alternative explanations for the arrest of the two Iraqi nationals, such as involvement in other terrorist activities unrelated to Fort Knox.
